entry.title: Julien is 20% done with A Line to Kill
Julien is 15% done with A Line to Kill
Julien added 'Giovanni’s Room'
entry.content: 📚 “Giovanni’s Room” by James Baldwin ⭐️ Rated: 4/5 📝 "Giovanni’s Room is a sentimental love story, sometimes bordering on melodrama, but it’s Baldwin’s writing that makes it the classic it is. His flow is effortless, and his descriptions of emotions, pla..." 🏷️ #JamesBaldwin

entry.title: Julien added 'The Case of the Blonde Bonanza'
entry.content: 📚 “The Case of the Blonde Bonanza” by Erle Stanley Gardner ⭐️ Rated: 3/5 📝 "The Case of the Blonde Bonanza is a slightly offbeat Perry Mason mystery, where the actual crime shows up rather late in the narrative and is resolved rather quickly. But the build-up to the murder is..." 🏷️ #ErleStanleyGardner
